Name: Pull Out Faucet
Subtitle: Easily wipe away with Touch-Clean spray holes
Details:
1) Single handle kitchen faucets for exposed mounting on 1, 2, 3 and 4 hole sinks.
2) Centermount or 8" (203 mm) centers with optional 10 1/2 (267 mm) long escutcheon included.
3) 7 1/4" (184 mm) high, 8 1/8" (206 mm) long spout nestled in metal hub assembly, swings 120.
4) Spout is connected to valve body with a 53'' (1346 mm) long hose.
5) Pull-out spout operates in an aerated or spray mode via an easy push button.
6) Lever handle shall return to neutral position when valve is turned off.

Name: Traditional Faucet
Subtitle: One-handle and two-handle options,contemporary/ modern look.
Details:
1) 3-hole 8" installation
2) High-arc spout swivels 360 degrees
3) Backed by Delta Faucet's Lifetime Limited Warranty

Name: Wall Mount Faucet
Subtitle: Clutter-free design , works well with vessel or wall mount sinks.
Details:
1) Ceramic Disc Valve Cartridges: Assures a lifetime of
drip-free performance.
2) Solid Brass Construction: Durable. Ideal for prolonged
contact with water.
3) Lead Free: Faucet contains ≤ 0.25% total lead content by
weighted average.
4) Choice of Finishes: Available in Polished Chrome or
Stainless Steel (PVD).

Name: Delta Shower
Subtitle: Delta Porter Single-Handle 3-Spray Shower Faucet in Brushed Nickel
Details:
1) Back-to-back installation capability.
2) Solid brass forged body.
3) Field adjustable means to limit handle rotation into hot
 water zone.
4) 120° maximum handle rotation

Name: Diamond Sink
Subtitle: Blanco Diamond Dual Mount Granite 33 in. 1-Hole Single Bowl.
Details:
1) Required outside cabinet: 33" (drop-in), 36” (undermount)
2) 80% solid granite
3) Heat resistant up to 536°F
4) Unsurpassed cleanability backed by industry

Name: Double
Subtitle: Spacious double bowl design
Details:
1. Required outside cabinet: 36" 
2. 80% solid granite 
3. Heat resistant up to 536°F 
4. Unsurpassed cleanability backed by industry leading 7 patents! 
5. Resistant to scratches

Name: Dual Mount
Subtitle: Heat-resistant to 536 degrees Fahrenheit
Details:
1. Required outside cabinet: 33" (drop-in), 36” (undermount) 
2. 80% solid granite 
3. Heat resistant up to 536°F 
4. Unsurpassed cleanability backed by industry leading 7 patents! 
5. Resistant to scratches, stains and all household acids and alkali solutions

Name: Glacier Shower
Subtitle: 3-Spray 3.45 in. Fixed Shower Head in Chrome
Details:
1. 3-spray settings; full, pulse/full and full/pulse combination
2. Chrome finish will complement a wide variety of decor
3. Rub clean nozzles for easy maintenance and lasting durability
4. Easy, tool-free maintenance

Name: Top Shower
Subtitle: 1-spray Single Function 10 in. Contemporary Round Raincan Showerhead in Polished Chrome
Details:
1. Single function Rain showerhead 
2. MasterCleanTM spray nozzles to prohibit mineral build-up for easy cleaning 
3. KatalystTM Spray Technology with air induction ball joint (patent pending) 
4. Optimized spray face for maximum performance 
5. Solid brass construction 
6. 2.5 gallon (9.5 L) per minute flow rate 
7. 1/2″ - 14 NPT connection

Name: Closed Front
Subtitle: Closed Front Toilet Seat in Platinum
Details:
1. Size: Round 
2. Material: Plastic 
3. Style: Closed Front with Cover 
4. Bumpers: Four 
5. Hinges: Plastic

Name: Elongated
Subtitle: Elongated White Bidet Smart Toilet Seat
Details:
1. ABS
2. Imported
3. 3 IN 1 STAINLESS STEEL NOZZLE - Offers posterior, feminine, and vortex washes, improves hygiene
4. SMART SEAT-SMART DECISION-Streamlined comfort-adjustable heated seat and water, slow closing lid

Name: Round
Subtitle: Close Round Closed Front Toilet Seat in White
Details:
1. STA-TITE seat fastening system never loosens and installs with ease
2. Whisper Close hinge slowly and quietly closes eliminating slamming and pinched fingers
3. Resilient plastic with molded-in color resists wear, chips and stains
4. Color-matched bumpers and hinges
